div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2020 Catanzaro environs, 1969 Burial: late 3rd cent. B.C. (Robinson) Contents: 80+ AR Carthage: 2 half-shekels (as NC 1964, pl. 5, 14, 15) 78 quarter-shekels (as NC 1964, pl. 5, 10-13, 16; some with a pellet under horse) Disposition: dispersed Seen in commerce
